item.title: What the Heck is Going On?
item.dc:creator: casinoskunk
item.description: Hey Gang, Ralph here to let you know what the heck is going on with The Tail End. Last week both Beth and I spent some time on Jay and Jack‘s 30 hour live podcast event for Autism Speaks. As announced by Beth, The Tail End will be ending. I know it sucks, but it […]
item.content:encoded:
Hey Gang,

Ralph here to let you know what the heck is going on with The Tail End. Last week both Beth and I spent some time on Jay and Jack‘s 30 hour live podcast event for Autism Speaks. As announced by Beth, The Tail End will be ending. I know it sucks, but it is a mutual decision between the both of us. Before you start coming at us with pitchforks and torches, we wanted to let you know that this does not mean that the show is done or that we are not podcasting anymore.

First things first. There are 5 episodes of The Tail End that have been recorded and need to be posted. Once I take care of some technical issues that is preventing the shows from being posted , I will post them here. It won’t be soon, but it will hopefully happen eventually (fingers crossed). Secondly the blog and all the shows will remain active so that you can go back and listen to them whenever you wish.

Even though The Tail End will be going the way of the dodo, that doesn’t mean that you have heard the last of us. Coming sooner than later will be an all new podcast starring Beth and Myself and hopefully many guests. I cannot tell you what the name of that show is, because the title has not been locked down yet, but I can tell you it will be fun and filled with conversations about farts and poos. Would you expect anything less?

Anyway, I would like to thank everyone who has been patient with us and would like to apologize to every last one of you for not sticking to our word on doing the remaining episodes. It was a pretty ambitious endeavor and we wish that we could have completed it. We love LOST and we love you guys. Stay tuned for our final 5 episodes and news on the upcoming podcast.

thank you all so much for patients.

Ralph-

item.title: Tail End Hiatus Update.
item.dc:creator: casinoskunk
item.description: Hey Folks, So here’s the deal. The show is in a bit of a hiatus as you can probably tell. The situation is that we have 3 episode for season 2 completed. I was thinking of posting those shows, but right after those shows went up we would be right back in another hiatus. As […]
item.content:encoded:
Hey Folks,

So here’s the deal. The show is in a bit of a hiatus as you can probably tell. The situation is that we have 3 episode for season 2 completed. I was thinking of posting those shows, but right after those shows went up we would be right back in another hiatus. As you know, Beth and Jorge are in Vancouver and it makes it tough to get recordings done. So I was thinking of holding off posting the 3 episodes until we could do show recordings on a regular basis.

Down time is going to be unavoidable. Let us know what you think in the comments section below and we will keep you updated here.

thanks,

Ralph-

item.title: Exodus
item.dc:creator: casinoskunk
item.description: Episode 23 – The marathon of podcasts recordings concludes, we talk about the season 1 finale of LOST and we celebrate our 9 month anniversary today! This episode is sure to please, especially if you are into Baby Deliveries, Godzilla and Period Blood!! Oh, we also talk about LOST with Jorge and get some fantastic […]
item.content:encoded:
Episode 23 – The marathon of podcasts recordings concludes, we talk about the season 1 finale of LOST and we celebrate our 9 month anniversary today! This episode is sure to please, especially if you are into Baby Deliveries, Godzilla and Period Blood!! Oh, we also talk about LOST with Jorge and get some fantastic calls into the hotline (206.888.4977) so sit back and enjoy! <href=”http://traffic.libsyn.com/dharmalars/TailEnd-23.mp3”>Exodus</a>

Click Below To Listen

EXODUS

On this episode Ralph and Beth discuss how to say Douchebag and Paper Towel in Korean, find out what C-Water is and get an incredible rendition of The Gummy Bears theme song. Sorry Renita, but the audio on your phone call got messed up and it sounded like you were auto-tuned.<href=”http://traffic.libsyn.com/dharmalars/TailEnd-17.mp3”>In Translation</a>

item.title: Jay and Jack’s Live Podcast Benefit for Autism Speaks
item.dc:creator: casinoskunk
item.description: Starting on Saturday March 12th and ending on Sunday March 13th, Jay and Jack (The Lost Podcast) will be hosting their annual Live Podcast to benefit Autism Speaks. Throughout the course of the 29 hour long show, Jay and Jack will be joined by many guests including Ralph and Beth!!! Jorge will also be joining […]
item.content:encoded:
Starting on Saturday March 12th and ending on Sunday March 13th, Jay and Jack (The Lost Podcast) will be hosting their annual Live Podcast to benefit Autism Speaks. Throughout the course of the 29 hour long show, Jay and Jack will be joined by many guests including Ralph and Beth!!! Jorge will also be joining for this great cause. If you want to watch the show live, follow the link here: LISTEN AND WATCH HERE

RALPH – 3/13 10am (est)
BETH –    3/13 3pm (est)
JORGE – 3/13 5pm (est)

COMPLETE LINEUP

For more information, please visit  JayAndJack.Com. Also be sure to check back here and follow our Twitter for more updates as the week goes on!

We get a couple of calls into the hotline (206.888.4977), so sit back and enjoy Raised By Another!

item.title: Create the Flashback Contest!
item.dc:creator: casinoskunk
item.description: WIN THE SHIRT OFF HER BACK!! The Tail End presents the “Create the Flashback and Win the Shirt off her Back Contest!” As you all know our very own Sidekick22 has been featured as a background extra on LOST, but never had the opportunity to tell her story in flashbacks. That is where you come […]
item.content:encoded:
WIN THE SHIRT OFF HER BACK!!

The Tail End presents the “Create the Flashback and Win the Shirt off her Back Contest!”

As you all know our very own Sidekick22 has been featured as a background extra on LOST, but never had the opportunity to tell her story in flashbacks. That is where you come in! All you have to do is create a backstory for “Roxanne” and write it out in one short and entertaining paragraph. That’s not all!! We also want to see a scene from her flashback. You can chose any artistic medium to depict the flashback, whether it be drawings, paintings, water colors, photoshop…etc. In order to get into the head of “Roxanne”, you must see what her “On Island” story is. To do that you can find her in the following episodes…

  • “The Shape of Things to Come“
  • “There’s No Place Like Home, Part 1“
  • “316“
  • “The Life and Death of Jeremy Bentham“
  • “Namaste“
  • “He’s Our You“
  • “Dead Is Dead“
  • “Recon“

Sounds pretty easy, huh? Well it may seem easy, but you have to make sure that you are really creative because the most creative entry will win a piece of LOST history!! That’s right, the winner of the contest will win The Purple Tank Top and the Mesh Hoodie actually worn by Sidekick22 on the show!! As if that wasn’t enough, Beth has mentioned that you may also receive a special surprise gift from Jorge Garcia, the guy who played Hurley on LOST!

THE RULES

  • Entries should not be a billion words long: Keep them short, because Ralph has to read some of these and you know how much he dislikes reading.
  • Entries should be about “Roxanne” only: The flashback should be about the character Roxanne and should not reflect the real life exploits of Bethany Shady.
  • Entries should be fun and not mean spirited: Remember, LOST was rated TV14, so let’s keep the entries in fairly good taste. I know The Tail End may be lewd at times, but we don’t need to go overboard here.
  • ALL ENTRIES NEED TO BE SUBMITTED ON TIME!: All entries must be sent to THETAILENDPODCAST@GMAIL.COM by 11:59pm JANUARY 31, 2011 (please include your name and address)

item.content:encoded:
Episode 3 –  Beth and Ralph are back to discuss the very first Kate Flashback episode, “Tabula Rasa”. Just a warning, we had some audio difficulties and practically LOST all of Beth’s audio, but was able to recover it on a backup source, so if the first half of the show sounds weird, we apologize. Also, we apologize for our 5 minute discussions on farts, actually farts are funny, so no apology needed! Enjoy the show and thanks to everyone who called the hotline! (206.888.4977)

item.title: Fart Drop Soup by Weird Boobs
item.dc:creator: casinoskunk
item.description: INGREDIENTS 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil (EVOO), 2 turns of the pan 3 cloves garlic, chopped 1/2 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes 1 medium onion, chopped 2 carrots, peeled and thinly sliced 2 ribs celery, chopped 1 small zucchini, sliced 2 cups vegetable or chicken stock 1 can diced tomato (15 ounces) 1 can tomato […]
item.content:encoded:
INGREDIENTS
2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil (EVOO), 2 turns of the pan
3 cloves garlic, chopped
1/2 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes
1 medium onion, chopped
2 carrots, peeled and thinly sliced
2 ribs celery, chopped
1 small zucchini, sliced
2 cups vegetable or chicken stock
1 can diced tomato (15 ounces)
1 can tomato sauce (15 ounces)
1 can small white beans or cannellini beans (15 ounces)
1 box, cut frozen green beans (10 ounces)
Salt and pepper
1 cup fresh basil, torn or shredded
Grated Parmigiano or Romano, to pass at table
Crusty bread, to pass at the table

PREPARATION
Add EVOO to the pot, 2 turns of the pan. Add garlic and crushed red pepper flakes, stir then stir in the onions, carrots, celery and zucchini. Cook 10 minutes, then add in the stock, tomatoes and beans. Bring soup up to a bubble and season with salt and pepper, to your taste. Simmer 5 minutes. Turn off the heat and wilt the basil into the soup. Ladle up the soup and serve with grated cheese and bread.

item.title: The Pilot part 2
item.dc:creator: casinoskunk
item.description: Episode 2 – The Tail End returns with a bang!! After the huge success of the first exciting episode and one long week later, Beth and Ralph settle down and get back into podcasting mode. They discuss “The Pilot part 2”, Shannon being useless and “Ralphing”. Jorge interrupts the show again to give us some […]
item.content:encoded:
Episode 2 – The Tail End returns with a bang!! After the huge success of the first exciting episode and one long week later, Beth and Ralph settle down and get back into podcasting mode. They discuss “The Pilot part 2”, Shannon being useless and “Ralphing”. Jorge interrupts the show again to give us some useful insight from his perspective on LOST. All this great stuff and four fantastic listener calls (206.888.4977) on this week’s episode of The Tail End: The Final Lost Podcast!
<a href=”http://traffic.libsyn.com/dharmalars/TailEnd-2.m4a”>The Pilot part 2</a>
Click Below To Listen
THE PILOT PART 2

item.title: The Pilot part 1
item.dc:creator: casinoskunk
item.description: Episode 1 – Welcome to the pilot episode of The Tail End. Join Beth, Ralph and a special guest as they kick off their rewatch of all six seasons of LOST. They discuss everything from old men extras, bobcat attacks and potato babies. Sit back and enjoy the first episode The Pilot part 1 and […]
item.content:encoded:
Episode 1 – Welcome to the pilot episode of The Tail End. Join Beth, Ralph and a special guest as they kick off their rewatch of all six seasons of LOST. They discuss everything from old men extras, bobcat attacks and potato babies. Sit back and enjoy the first episode The Pilot part 1 and don’t forget to call into the Hotline at (206)888-4977
<a href=”http://traffic.libsyn.com/dharmalars/TailEnd-1.m4a”>The Pilot part 1</a>
Click Below To Listen
THE PILOT PART 1

item.title: The Tail End Mobile Version
item.dc:creator: casinoskunk
item.description: For all of you fans of The Tail End Podcast, you can now view the site on your iPhone whenever you feel like, thanks to wordpress. Simply go to thetailendpodcast.wordpress.com in your Safari browser and press the + button on the bottom of the page, select “ADD TO HOMESCREEN” and you will will be able to access the […]
item.content:encoded:
For all of you fans of The Tail End Podcast, you can now view the site on your iPhone whenever you feel like, thanks to wordpress. Simply go to thetailendpodcast.wordpress.com in your Safari browser and press the + button on the bottom of the page, select “ADD TO HOMESCREEN” and you will will be able to access the mobile version whenever you want!

This will give you a streamlined version of the Blog on your phone and will allow you to listen to shows directly from your iPhone as we post them.

item.title: The Tail End HOTLINE
item.dc:creator: casinoskunk
item.description: The Tail End podcast is going to test a listener hotline. We are not sure that it will be an ongoing feature on the show, but you may get a chance to have your voice heard on the show. Along with the blog, we want the Tail End hotline to be a fun place for […]
item.content:encoded:
The Tail End podcast is going to test a listener hotline. We are not sure that it will be an ongoing feature on the show, but you may get a chance to have your voice heard on the show. Along with the blog, we want the Tail End hotline to be a fun place for people to go and celebrate LOST. Hatred will not be tolerated.  Both Beth and Ralph have a great affinity for LOST and want to make sure that there is love from the listeners as well. We would love to hear what you have to say about each episode of LOST.  If we do play calls, they will all be played at the end of the show after Beth and Ralph have signed off. Due to the nature of the schedule we may receive calls after we have finished recording, so keep in mind that we will most likely not be able to field questions asked in the phone call. If you want to be on the show here are some things to keep in mind before you call.

  • Not all calls will be played – To keep the show running time down, we will not be able to play all calls. We apologize in advanced if your call does not get played. 
  • Cut to the chase – To allow us to get more listeners on the show, make your call short and sweet.
  • Relevance is radical – Making your call centered around the Lost episode that we are discussing that week, would be perfect for a more rich listening experience for everyone.
  • Be real – No need for whacky characters, be yourself. You love Lost, be proud to speak your mind. 
  • Keep out of reach of children – Because “The Tail End” will come equipped with an [explicit] tag, we will not play calls from listeners who are under age. 
  • Pay your dues – Keep in mind that this is not a toll free number and standard rates apply.
  • Make it fun – Nobody wants to listen to a “Debbie Downer”, so have a good time when you call in. This is a celebration of Lost. It’s Party Time!!

So now that you know what kind of calls we are looking for, feel free to call any time. The Hotline answering machine is available for calls 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. And once again remember that this is not a toll free number, standard phone call rates apply. We look forward to hearing what you have to say!

 206-888-4977
